channel.title: Night chat with psychic weirdness
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was the prince and jailed the psychic. I also died that night. The last line of what the psychic said in jail, just as the timer hit zero, went into dead chat as being from "Psychic" and was seen by people other than me.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Everything that 10 said should have gone into jail chat with me.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments:
![20180316185709_1|690x431](upload://PCtMwZqtMIsd35d7ZjSXNi99lI.jpg)
